diagnosis.final_diagnosis: untreated panhypopituitarism due to absence of the pituitary stalk
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of untreated panhypopituitarism was supported by laboratory findings indicating multiple pituitary hormone deficiencies and MRI findings showing a small anterior pituitary remnant, absence of the pituitary stalk, and ectopic neurohypophysis, along with a unique growth curve pattern.
